column1: Table 17. Median time served by released state prison inmates admitted on new court commitments, by sex and offense, 2002 and 2012
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program, National Corrections Reporting Program
Table 17. Median time served by released state prison inmates admitted on new court commitments, by sex and offense, 2002 and 2012

Note: Estimates based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year who entered prison on a new court commitment. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding and missing offense data. Offense distributions are based on the 35 states that submitted to both the 2002 and 2012 National Corrections Reporting Program (NCRP) data collection, while estimated counts of releases represent data for all states based on NPS. See Methodology.
b/Includes trafficking, possession, and other drug offenses.
c/Includes weapons, drunk driving, and court offenses; commercialized vice, morals, and decency offenses; and liquor law violations and other public-order offenses.
d/Includes juvenile offenses and other unspecified offense categories.
e/Excludes transfers, AWOLs, and escapes. See Methodology.
Sources: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics Program and National Corrections Reporting Program, 2002 and 2012.
